name: part_003
file: tmp_【#白上フブキ生誕LIVE】Congrats Birthday FOX【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ】 [7Vs-5Rwu8ks]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki performs the end of 'Koizora Yoho'.
Fubuki's MC section after her solo performances.
Transition to the collaboration segment, introducing Nakiri Ayame and Ookami Mio.
Shirakami Fubuki, Nakiri Ayame, and Ookami Mio perform 'Kami no Manimani'.

subtitles.original: これからもきっと
subtitles.english: From now on, I'm sure

subtitles.original: 晴れのち曇りで雨も降るでしょう
subtitles.english: It will be sunny, then cloudy, and then it'll rain too

subtitles.original: あいつの笑顔を
subtitles.english: At his smiling face,

subtitles.original: いつも見とれて
subtitles.english: I'm always staring in wonder,

subtitles.original: 私 本日恋してる
subtitles.english: Because today, I'm in love

subtitles.original: 迷う...
subtitles.english: Lost in it...

subtitles.original: ずっと
subtitles.english: Forever,

subtitles.original: このまま恋してたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep being in love like this

subtitles.original: 私
subtitles.english: Me

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、2曲続けて聴いていただきました！
subtitles.english: Alright! So, those were two songs in a row!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: いや〜、めちゃくちゃ緊張した！
subtitles.english: Man, I was so incredibly nervous!

subtitles.original: 歌詞間違えてなかったですかね？
subtitles.english: I didn't mess up the lyrics, did I?

subtitles.original: あ、たぶん、たぶん大丈夫だったと思います！
subtitles.english: Ah, I think... I think it was probably fine!

subtitles.original: さてね、『GARNET MOON』！
subtitles.english: Now then, 'GARNET MOON'!

subtitles.original: 島みや(えい子)さん大好きかつね、
subtitles.english: I love Shimamiya (Eiko)-san, and,

subtitles.original: ま、これが主題歌になりましたゲームも大好き、
subtitles.english: well, I also love the game this was the theme for,

subtitles.original: ということで「いつかライブで歌ってやるぞ」という気持ちで、
subtitles.english: so with the feeling of "I'm gonna sing this live someday,"

subtitles.original: はい、意気込みで歌いました。難しかったですね！
subtitles.english: yes, I sang it with all my heart. It was difficult!

subtitles.original: そして『恋空予報』ですね。
subtitles.english: And then, 'Koizora Yoho'.

subtitles.original: フブキの大好きなボカロ曲でもありまして、
subtitles.english: It's one of my favorite Vocaloid songs,

subtitles.original: いつかね、何か歌いたいなとか、歌ってみた動画とか出したいなと思ってたんですけど、
subtitles.english: and I've always wanted to sing it or put out a cover video,

subtitles.original: こうやってね、ライブでやらせていただきました。イェーイ！
subtitles.english: and now I finally got to perform it live like this. Yay!

subtitles.original: ではでは、ここからはですね、
subtitles.english: Now then, from here on out,

subtitles.original: コラボパートに移りたいと思います！
subtitles.english: I'd like to move on to the collaboration part!

subtitles.original: さぁ一体、誰がゲストで来るのでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Now then, I wonder just who the guests will be?

subtitles.original: お楽しみに！
subtitles.english: Look forward to it!

subtitles.original: 思い通りにいかないことだらけ
subtitles.english: With nothing but things not going as planned,

subtitles.original: どうしようもなく自己嫌悪
subtitles.english: I'm hopelessly stuck in self-loathing

subtitles.original: 八百万の痛みや悲しみから
subtitles.english: From the millions of pains and sorrows,

subtitles.original: 逃げ込める場所を探してる
subtitles.english: I'm searching for a place to escape

subtitles.original: いっそ岩の隙間に引きこもって
subtitles.english: I might as well shut myself in a cave,

subtitles.original: 月も太陽も無視して眠ろう
subtitles.english: Ignoring the moon and sun and just sleep

subtitles.original: 生まれてきたことの意味なんて
subtitles.english: The meaning of being born into this world...

subtitles.original: 知らない 分かんないよ
subtitles.english: I don't know, I don't understand it

subtitles.original: でもそんな風に思えるってことは それは
subtitles.english: But the fact that you can feel that way, it means

subtitles.original: 君がもっともっと素敵になれる
subtitles.english: That you have the power to become

subtitles.original: 力があるって教えてるんだよ
subtitles.english: Even more and more wonderful

subtitles.original: そうさ 神のまにまに 仰せのままに
subtitles.english: That's right, at the will of the gods, just as they say

subtitles.original: 誰だって地球を愛してる
subtitles.english: Everyone loves the Earth

subtitles.original: 飲めや歌えやどんちゃん騒ぎ
subtitles.english: Drink and sing and make a big fuss

subtitles.original: たまにはそんなのもいいね
subtitles.english: Sometimes that kind of thing is nice too

subtitles.original: そうさ 北も南も 右も左も
subtitles.english: That's right, North or South, Right or Left

subtitles.original: なんだかんだ地球を愛してる
subtitles.english: One way or another, we love the Earth

subtitles.original: 泥んこだけど歩いて行ける
subtitles.english: Even if we're covered in mud, we can keep walking

subtitles.original: まだまだ先は長いさ
subtitles.english: The road ahead is still long

subtitles.original: ただただ人でいたいだけ
subtitles.english: I just want to be human,

subtitles.original: きっと誰もがそう願っているけど
subtitles.english: I'm sure everyone wishes for that, but

subtitles.original: 八百万の心の醜さに
subtitles.english: By the ugliness of millions of hearts,

subtitles.original: 苦しめられる毎日さ
subtitles.english: We're tormented every single day

subtitles.original: 僕が生まれてきたこと
subtitles.english: The fact that I was born,

subtitles.original: 奇跡と言えば聞こえはいいけど
subtitles.english: It sounds nice to call it a miracle, but

subtitles.original: それはきっと偶然に過ぎなくて
subtitles.english: It's surely nothing more than a coincidence,

subtitles.original: やっぱり意味なんてないさ
subtitles.english: And in the end, there's no meaning to it

subtitles.original: でも例えば君に意地悪をする奴が
subtitles.english: But for example, if there's someone being mean to you,

subtitles.original: 居るならそれは君がとっても素敵な人だって
subtitles.english: It means that you're an incredibly wonderful person,

subtitles.original: 教えてるんだよ
subtitles.english: And they're just showing it

subtitles.original: そうさ 神のまにまに 仰せのままに
subtitles.english: That's right, at the will of the gods, just as they say

subtitles.original: 誰だって地球を愛してる
subtitles.english: Everyone loves the Earth

subtitles.original: 僕が笑って君も笑えば
subtitles.english: If I laugh and you laugh too,

subtitles.original: 許せないことなんてないよ
subtitles.english: There's nothing that can't be forgiven

subtitles.original: そうさ 男も女も 恋しかるべき
subtitles.english: That's right, men and women should fall in love

subtitles.original: なんだかんだ地球を愛してる
subtitles.english: One way or another, we love the Earth
